title: Week 3: January 12–18 - Genesis 1–2; Moses 2–3; Abraham 4–5
content:
# Week 3: Jesus Created a Beautiful World

## Lesson Overview
Jesus created the beautiful world for us. We are made in Heavenly Father's image, special like Him.

## Wiggle Activity (2-3 minutes)
**Creation March**  
March around the room while singing "On the first day, God made light!" (clap on "light"). Add arm waves for sky, stomp for land. Do 3 days fast—wiggle arms like fish, flap like birds!

## Simple Scripture
"God created man in his own image." (Genesis 1:27)  
Point to your heart, then smile big. Say it 3 times together with claps: "God cre-a-ted *me* in His image!"

## Main Activities (15 minutes total)

### 1. Object Lesson: World in a Box (3 minutes)  
**Materials**: Shoebox with toy sun, grass, animal picture, flower.  
**Steps**: 1. Hold empty box—"This was empty like earth at first." 2. Add items one by one. 3. Let kids touch and name.  
**Say**: "Jesus filled empty space with beautiful things! He made sun, grass, animals for us. What do you love He made?" (Moses 2:1–25)

### 2. Game: Creation Hunt (4 minutes)  
**Materials**: Hide 5 picture cards (sun, tree, bird, fish, flower) around room.  
**Steps**: 1. Say "Go find what Jesus made!" 2. Kids run to find. 3. Bring back, shout "Jesus made [item]!"  
**Say**: "Jesus created everything good! Run and find His creations." (Genesis 1:1–25)

### 3. Hands-On Craft: My Special Body (4 minutes)  
**Materials**: Paper outlines of kid bodies, crayons.  
**Steps**: 1. Trace hand or draw smiley face. 2. Color "God's image." 3. Say "I am special!"  
**Say**: "Draw how God made you special in His image. We look like Him inside!" (Genesis 1:26–27; Moses 2:26–27)

### 4. Music & Movement: Animal Dance (4 minutes)  
**Materials**: None.  
**Steps**: 1. Swim like fish, fly like birds. 2. Freeze when teacher says "Jesus made you!" 3. Wiggle and roar like lions.  
**Say**: "Jesus made animals—move like them! He made you too."

## Picture Time
Show "The Creation" by Annie Henrie Nader (Gospel Art Book).  
Ask: "What do you see Jesus making?" "How does it make you feel happy?" "Point to beautiful things!"

## Song
“My Heavenly Father Loves Me” (Children’s Songbook, 228–29).  
Actions: Point up for heaven, touch eyes/nose/mouth, hug self for love.

## Snack Idea
Apple slices—red like pretty flowers Jesus made! (Allergy-friendly.)

## Testimony Moment
"Jesus created this beautiful world and you in Heavenly Father's image. He loves you so much."  
Invite: Fold arms and say together, "I love Jesus! Thank You for creating me."

## Teacher Survival Tips
1. Use a timer bell for quick switches—keeps wiggles excited!  
2. If a child disrupts, hug and whisper "Jesus made you special—help friend?"  
3. Too wiggly? Add extra marches; skip one activity for more play.
